CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_wxz_payment_fans` ( `uid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `openid` varchar(40) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `is_admin` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '是否是管理员,0否,1是', `created` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '创建时间', PRIMARY KEY (`uid`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `openid` (`openid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_wxz_payment_order` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` INT(11) NOT NULL, `order_no` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '订单编号', `fans_id` INT(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '1.粉丝id', `money` INT(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '订单金额分计算', `pay_money` INT(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '实际支付金额', `fail_reason` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '失败原因', `trade_no` varchar(50) NOT NULL COMMENT '微信流水号', `status` INT(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 COMMENT '订单状态1待处理,2成功，3失败', `success_at` INT(11) NOT NULL, `update_at` INT(11) NOT NULL, `create_at` INT(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `fans_id` (`fans_id`), KEY `order_no` (`order_no`) ) ENGINE=INNODB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
